pageTitle: Navy Cotton Stripe Top | Petit Bateau | Avenue32
textBeforeTable: CLOTHES In order to see what size you would be please refer to our comprehensive sizing guide. The ‘searchable size’ is the Avenue32 master size as seen on the sizing guide. All products available to purchase on Avenue32 include the measurements of the item, where applicable. If you are unsure of your size, we advise you to take your measurements or contact customer services for more details about the fit of a specific item.
